p: Boukhira et al. [ 20] evaluated the antifungal activity of T. satureioides EOs obtained from aerial parts against a yeast, Candida albicans (ATCC-10231), and a mould Aspergillus brasiliensis (ATCC-16404), using radial growth inhibition and broth microdilution assays. This study showed that the studied EOs exert effective effect against C. albicans (Ф = 24.67 ± 0.67 mm, MIC = 0.6 μl/mL) and A. brasiliensis (MIC = 1.3 μl/mL).
